mapper.select: SELECT mbmmr.`serial_number`, mbmmr.`amount`, ml.`phone`, ml.`nick_name` FROM marketing_business_make_money_record mbmmr LEFT JOIN member_list ml ON mbmmr.`member_list_id` = ml.`id` WHERE mbmmr.`marketing_business_make_money_id` = #{marketingBusinessMakeMoneyId} AND mbmmr.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY mbmmr.`create_time` DESC
